bike.description: A6-SL custom-butted alloy w/ shaped top tube & integrated 1 1/2" lower, tapered head tube, oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, PIIS BB86 shell, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: A6-SL custom-butted alloy, forged-road dropout w/ replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: FC-770 Cross carbon blade, alloy crown w/ tapered alloy steerer & alloy dropout
Shimano Tiagra STI shifter/brake combo, Flight Deck-compatible, 20-speed
Vera Corsa aero alloy clincher, 24/28H w/ bladed spokes
Vittoria XN Pro, 26 tpi, 700c x 32mm, wire bead
FSA Orbit C-40, 1 1/8" upper - 1 1/2" lower, integrated
